message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.io.*.
WhitespaceAround: '{' is not preceded with whitespace.
'if' has incorrect indentation level 19, expected level should be one of the following: 16, 20, 24.
'}' at column 17 should be alone on a line.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
WhitespaceAround: '{' is not preceded with whitespace.
